actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The aridni makes three Shortsword or Pixie Bow attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Pixie Bow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The aridni casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
At will: dancing lights, detect magic, invisibility
3/day each: charm person, faerie fire
1/day: spike growth

bonus_actions.name: Enchanted Arrows
bonus_actions.desc: The aridni enchants one arrow with minor magic. The next time it hits a creature with a Pixie Bow attack before the start of its next turn, the target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or suffer one of the following effects:

bonus_actions.name: Confusion
bonus_actions.desc: The target can't take reactions and acts randomly until the end of its next turn, as if it had failed the saving throw against the confusion spell.

bonus_actions.name: Fear
bonus_actions.desc: The target is frightened until the end of its next turn and must spend its next turn moving away from the aridni by the safest available route.

bonus_actions.name: Laughter
bonus_actions.desc: The target falls prone and is incapacitated with laughter until the end of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Sleep
bonus_actions.desc:
The target falls unconscious for 1 minute. It wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.




Aridni in Midgard

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The aridni doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The aridni has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
